citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1PM to 1:40 PM on
March 19th, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocked on the door as well as calling and texting
to the licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Critical Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1PM to 1:40 PM on 
March 19th, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocked on the door as well as calling and texting 
to the licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
